content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1/4 cup sifted all-purpose flour" )
( ing-1 "1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder" )
( ing-2 "1/2 teaspoon baking powder" )
( ing-3 "1 pinch salt" )
( ing-4 "2 ounces butter" )
( ing-5 "1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract" )
( ing-6 "1/4 cup white sugar" )
( ing-7 "1 egg" )
( ing-8 "2 egg yolks" )
( ing-9 "1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "375 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "190 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Sift the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt together.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Sift"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the flour"@8:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cocoa"@19:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "baking powder"@26:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@44:48 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cream the butter with the vanilla and the sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cream"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the butter"@9:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the vanilla"@25:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the sugar"@41:50 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Add the egg and egg yolks, beating to mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "the egg"@7:14 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "egg yolks"@19:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "beating"@30:37 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-4-0 "to mix"@38:44 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir in the dry ingredients until just combined only, do not over mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "the dry ingredients"@11:30 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until just combined only"@31:55 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Place rounded teaspoon of batter into the prepared Madeleine shell forms.
7) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "375 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-7-1 "190 degrees C"@26:39 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "12 minutes"@45:55 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Remove from oven and immediately invert onto a wire rack to cool.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:source ( tool-8-0 "oven"@15:19 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-1 "invert"@36:42 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-8-1 "a wire rack"@48:59 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-8-0 "to cool"@60:67 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Once cool sprinkle with confectioners' sugar, if desired.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "sprinkle"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "confectioners' sugar"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:when ( cond-9-0 "Once cool"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
